name: My Doll's House
description:
The furniture from my doll's house has gotten scattered in the forest. Collect it and place it in the house. Nothing scary about that.

~ Controls ~
W, A, S, D or arrow keys to move. Left mouse and hold to grab and pick up the furniture. You have to be looking right at the furniture and you have to be kind of close to it to pick it up.

ESC at any time to quit.

Made for Tasting Room Jam: Halloween 2019 in approximately 3 days.

System Requirements: 

You will need a dedicated graphics card for a decent frame rate because of the fog effects in the scene.

* Special Thanks *

Thanks  RedMountainMan1 for helping create the creepy surprise in this game using Blender.
